item.description: 01 अथातः षोडशे वर्षे ...{Loading}... अथातः षोडशे वर्षे गोदानम् १ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 1 Now (follows) the Godāna ceremony (or cutting of the beard), in the sixteenth year. 02 चूडाकरणेन केशान्तकरणं व्याख्यातम् ...{Loading}... चूडाकरणेन केशान्तकरणं व्याख्यातम् २ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 2 The cutting of the hair (and the beard) has been explained by the (description of the) Cūḍākaraṇa (II, 9). 03 ब्रह्मचारी केशान्तान्कारयते ...{Loading}... ब्रह्मचारी केशान्तान्कारयते ३ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 3 The student has his hair (and beard) cut himself.

These are the various possibilities. 04 संवत्सरमप्येके ...{Loading}... संवत्सरमप्येके ४ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... Or also one year, according to some (teachers). 05 व्रतं तु भूयः .

01 प्रौष्ठपदीं हस्तेनोऽपाकरणम् ...{Loading}... प्रौष्ठपदीं हस्तेनोऽपाकरणम् १ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 1 On the full-moon day of Prauṣṭhapada (or) under (the Nakṣatra) Hasta the Upākaraṇa (or opening ceremony of the annual term of Veda-study, is performed). 02 व्याहृतिभिर्हुत्वा शिष्याणां सावित्र्यनुवचनम् ...{Loading}... व्याहृतिभिर्हुत्वा शिष्याणां सावित्र्यनुवचनं यथोपनयने २ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 2 After (the teacher) has sacrificed with the Vyāhṛtis, he recites the Sāvitrī to the students as at the Upanayana; 03 सामसावित्रीं च .

01 ब्रह्मचारी वेदमधीत्य ...{Loading}... ब्रह्मचारी वेदमधीत्य १ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 1 A student, after he has studied the Veda, 02 उपन्याहृत्य गुरवे ...{Loading}... उपन्याहृत्य गुरवे २ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... And has offered a present to his Guru (i.e. to his) teacher, 03 अनुज्ञातो दारान्कुर्वीत ...{Loading}... अनुज्ञातो दारान्कुर्वीत ३ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 2 Should, with the permission (of his parents), take a wife, 04 असगोत्रान् ...{Loading}... असगोत्रान् ४ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... One who does not belong to the same Gotra, 05 मातुरसपिण्डा .

Here the teachers enumerate the following (regulations). 03 नाजातलोम्न्योपहासमिच्छेत् ...{Loading}... नाजातलोम्न्योपहासमिच्छेत् ३ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... Nājātalomnyopahāsam icchet. 04 नायुग्वा ...{Loading}... नायुग्वा ४ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... Nor (should he wish for sport) with a girl who is the only child of her mother, 05 न रजस्वलया .

I, 8, 1). 02 प्रत्यागता इमा मधुमतीर्मह्यमिति ...{Loading}... प्रत्यागता इमा मधुमतीर्मह्यमिति २ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... When they have come back, (he should repeat the verse), ‘These which are rich in sweet’ (ibid.

01 अथातः श्रवणाकर्म ...{Loading}... अथातः श्रवणाकर्म १ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 1 Now (follows) the Śravaṇā ceremony. 02 पौर्णमास्यां कृत्यम् ...{Loading}... पौर्णमास्यां कृत्यम् २ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... It has to be performed on the full-moon day (of the month Śrāvaṇa). 03 पुरस्ताच्छालाया उपलिप्य शालाग्नेरग्निम् ...{Loading}... पुरस्ताच्छालाया उपलिप्य शालाग्नेरग्निं प्रणयन्ति ३ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... Having besmeared (a surface) to the east of the house (with cow-dung), they carry forward (to that place) fire taken from the (sacred) domestic fire.

01 आश्वयुज्यां पौर्णमास्यां पृषातके ...{Loading}... आश्वयुज्यां पौर्णमास्यां पृषातके पायसश्चरू रौद्रः १ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 1 On the full-moon day of (the month) Āśvayuja, at the Pṛṣātaka ceremony, a mess of boiled rice-grains with milk, sacred to Rudra, (is prepared). 02 तस्य जुहुयादा नो ...{Loading}... तस्य जुहुयादा नो मित्रावरुणेति प्रथमां मा नस्तोक इति द्वितीयाम् २ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... Of that (milk-rice) let him sacrifice, the first oblation with (the verse), ‘To us, O Mitra and Varuṇa’ (Sāma-veda I, 220), the second with (the verse), ‘Not in our offspring’ (Ṛg-veda I, 114, 8), 03 गोनामभिश्च पृथक् काम्यासीत्येतत्प्रभृतिभिः .

01 आग्रहायण्यां बलिहरणम् ...{Loading}... आग्रहायण्यां बलिहरणम् १ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 1 On the Āgrahāyaṇī day (or the full-moon day of the month Mārgaśīrṣa) Bali-offerings (are made). 02 तच्छ्रावणेनैव व्याख्यातम् ...{Loading}... तच्छ्रावणेनैव व्याख्यातम् २ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 2 They have been explained by the Śrāvaṇa sacrifice. 03 नमः पृथिव्या इत्येतम् ...{Loading}... नमः पृथिव्या इत्येतं मन्त्रं न जपति ३ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 3 He does not murmur (here) the Mantra, ‘Adoration to the Earth’s.’ 04 अथ पूर्वाह्ण एव .

01 अष्टका रात्रिदेवता ...{Loading}... अष्टका रात्रिदेवता १ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... 1 The Aṣṭakā (is a festival) sacred to the night. 02 पुष्टिकर्म ...{Loading}... पुष्टिकर्म २ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... It procures prosperity. 03 आग्नेयी पित्र्या वा ...{Loading}... आग्नेयी पित्र्या वा प्राजापत्यर्तुदेवता वैश्वदेवीति देवताविचाराः ३ Oldenberg ...{Loading}... It is sacred to Agni, or to the Manes, or to Prajāpati, or to the Seasons, or to the Viśve devāsthus the deity (to which the Aṣṭakā is sacred), is investigated (by different teachers).
